name: DailyFeaturedArticle
0:
”Alexa, open Daily Featured Article”
”Read yesterday's article”
”Set a reminder”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily featured article
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Each day, Wikipedia publishes a digest based on one of its best articles. With Daily Featured Article, Alexa will read them to you and display article pictures on devices with screens. To improve the listening experience, Daily Featured Article splits the article into discrete paragraphs and adjusts the text to make it more suitable for listening.

To listen to today's article, just open Daily Featured Article or ask Daily Featured Article to read today's digest.
To listen to articles from other dates, ask to read the article for a particular date. For example, eg ask Daily Featured Article to read yesterday's article; or ask for the article for July 1st, 2020.
You can also instruct Alexa to read articles from other days at any time from within the skill.
If you enjoy the articles, why not make listening to them part of your daily routine? Ask to set a daily reminder at any point.
If you get stuck, just ask for help.

This skill is not associated nor endorsed with the Wikimedia Foundation, Inc.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
